posts.post_title: FS: T205 Wallace (no cap) One Line of Stats SGC 10
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Kevin Struss
This example exhibits creasing, but is otherwise a very nice card for the grade.

$675. Price includes shipping and insurance. PayPal is accepted, but please add 3%.

Call or email with any questions. 949-494-0248 

Also, if anyone wants to be put on my email list, please send me your contact information. 

Thanks, Kevin
